title: 3 and Out - Bears Beatdown Belichick, Jets Injury Disaster, Brady Blame, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Bears Beatdown Belichick, Jets Injury Disaster, Brady Blame, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Bears handing Belichick and the Pats a beatdown in Foxboro, why he’s bullish on Justin Fields going forward, and what’s next for Mac Jones after getting pulled mid-start. He also explains why Frank Reich is toast in Indy, why the Jets have been able to turn things around through 7 weeks, why injuries could derail them, if Tom Brady’s frequent absences are to blame for the Bucs bad start, and the latest evidence of Chargers HC Brandon Staley being in over his head, and the Giants and Cowboys continuing to exceed expectations, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd #volume
